title: 820-3115 Green light but ?not turn on
message:
820-3115 Green light but  not turn on.
It was working unit i just changed hinges cover after that not turn on, only green light.
PPBUS_G3H=12.57v
Not turn on with a charged battery.
PP3V42-GH=3.49V
3v3_S5=3.29v
PP5V_S5=5v
PPVIN_SW_T29BST=2.5v
Any help please.

title: 820-3115 Green light but ?not turn on
message:
Post SMC_ADAPTER_EN, PM_BATLOW_L, PM_SLP_SUS_L, 3V3_SUS.
Trigger SMC_ONOFF_L and check any reaction at PM_PWRBTN_L.
Does it start in SMC bypass mode?

title: 820-3115 Green light but ?not turn on
message:
SMC_ADAPTER_EN=3.46v
PM_BATLOW_L=unable to measured.
3V3_SUS=3.3v
SMC_ONOFF_L=3.48v
PM_PWRBTN_L=3.47v
 Start in SMC bypass mode , i dont know how to do this check, could you please 
show me how to do that checking?
Thanks.

title: 820-3115 Green light but ?not turn on
message:
"Start in SMC bypass mode , i dont know how to do this check, could you please
show me how to do that checking?"

Google knows that for sure.
Learn to use online tools and you gain time.

Press power button, connect charger and maintain pressing 5-10s...

PM_BATLOW_L is available at Q5040.

title: 820-3115 Green light but ?not turn on
message:
PM_BATLOW_L=3.24v
yes ,start in SMC bypass mode

title: 820-3115 Green light but ?not turn on
message:
So you have a sensor issue.
Post voltage at pins 9 & 15 of U7000, charger and battery connected.
Be sure R7021/22 and R7051/52 have correct value.

title: 820-3115 Green light but ?not turn on
message:
Voltage at U7000, charger and battery connected.
pins 9= .47v
pin15=.048v

 R7021/22=16.42v both, 10 ohm both.
 R7051/52=11.91v both,  2.4 ohm,.2 ohm respectively.

title: 820-3115 Green light but ?not turn on
message: Post now voltage for SMC_DCIN_VSENSE and SMC_PBUS_VSENSE.

title: 820-3115 Green light but ?not turn on
message:
SMC_DCIN_VSENSE=2.08v
SMC_PBUS_VSENSE=1.45v

title: 820-3115 Green light but ?not turn on
message:
Post the signals on charger mode only, without battery.

"Trigger SMC_ONOFF_L and check any reaction at PM_PWRBTN_L."
???
Check for ripped off componentes...

title: 820-3115 Green light but ?not turn on
message:
charger mode only:
SMC_DCIN_VSENSE=2.08v
SMC_PBUS_VSENSE=1.45v

Trigger SMC_ONOFF_L and check any reaction at PM_PWRBTN_L."
how to do this checking?
I could not find any missing components.
Thanks.

title: 820-3115 Green light but ?not turn on
message:
"how to do this checking?"
Use R5015/16 pads for that...

title: 820-3115 Green light but ?not turn on
message: "Trigger SMC_ONOFF_L " it means short  R5015/16   pins and check the V at PM_PWRBTN_L.?

title: 820-3115 Green light but ?not turn on
message:
Yes, you must see a drop pulse there.
Solder a wire on SMC_ONOFF_L and touch the ground with it...

title: 820-3115 Green light but ?not turn on
message: I found 350 mv at PM_PWRBTN_L after Solder a wire on SMC_ONOFF_L. I dont have ocps so use Fluke 114 True rms.

title: 820-3115 Green light but ?not turn on
message:
Just touch the ground for a moment, like pressing power button.
PM_PWRBTN_L must drop and go back to high level instantly.

title: 820-3115 Green light but ?not turn on
message:
Just touch the ground for a moment, like pressing power button.
PM_PWRBTN_L must drop and go back to high level instantly.
## I found  PM_PWRBTN_L OL and when touch the ground it goes up quickly 373 mv and drop 353mv very fast.

title: 820-3115 Green light but ?not turn on
message:
So you never get 3V at PM_PWRBTN_L?
It should stay high all time.
Only drops if SMC_ONOFF_L is triggered.

title: 820-3115 Green light but ?not turn on
message: I made a mistake ( measured it before in mv). After right measurement i found 3V at  PM_PWRBTN_L , all times and drop it 0.353v ( stable)  if SMC_ONOFF_L is triggered.

title: 820-3115 Green light but ?not turn on
message: Check if PM_SLP_S4_L pulses at the same moment.

title: 820-3115 Green light but ?not turn on
message: PM_SLP_S4_L =3.3v stable if trigger then 2.4v

title: 820-3115 Green light but ?not turn on
message:
2.4V at PM_SLP_S4_L is good enough to enable all S3 voltages; check if all present.
Check the same for S0 voltages, if PM_SLP_S3_L goes also high.

title: 820-3115 Green light but ?not turn on
message: I tried to swap good bios after that now i see no green even i swap again original bios still no green light , PPbus G3H is 12.23v. This is a nightmare now.

title: 820-3115 Green light but ?not turn on
message: Check for ripped/moved resistors near BIOS chip...

title: 820-3115 Green light but ?not turn on
message:
NO RIPPED/MOVED register near bios.
I checked the following value
PPBUS_G3H = 12.26V
PP3V42_G3H = 3.48V
SMC_RESET_L = 3.3v
SMC_BC_ACOK = 3.4V
ADAPTER_SENSE = 3.4V
P3V3S5_LL = 0V
SMC_ONOFF_L = 3.4V

title: 820-3115 Green light but ?not turn on
message: Check if BIOS chip is correctly soldered; pay atention to its orientation.

title: 820-3115 Green light but ?not turn on
message: BIOS chip is correctly soldered 100%. This is not too small component , perfect orientation. looks very good.

title: 820-3115 Green light but ?not turn on
message: Put back original BIOS and report...

title: 820-3115 Green light but ?not turn on
message:
i put it back origianl Bios and get back green light for while when reconnect it no green light

PP3V3_S3=0v
ppbus-G3H=12.26v
PP3V42_G3H at C6908=3.49v
SMC_BC_ACOK_VCC=3.49V
ADAPTER_SENSE=2.9V
SMC_ADAPTER_EN ( Q7920 PIN2)=0V

title: 820-3115 Green light but ?not turn on
message:
Pins 4 & 5 of U6900 should have both same high voltage, equal with central pin of DCIN board.

"ppbus-G3H=12.26v"
SMC doesn't talk with ISL6259, or something else blocks the I2C bus.

Are you sure about using original Apple 60/85W charger?

title: 820-3115 Green light but ?not turn on
message:
This is known good original adapter.
Pins 4 & 5 of U6900  have both same 3.48v ( before it was wrong)
so what should i check next

title: 820-3115 Green light but ?not turn on
message:
Do you have same voltage at central pin of DCIN board?
Check continuity from U6900 to it.
SMC_RESET_L voltage?

title: 820-3115 Green light but ?not turn on
message:
SMC_RESET_L =3.41v
central pin of DCIN board=3.46v
Check continuity from U6900 to it. is ok
Now I see green light. but not turn on.

title: 820-3115 Green light but ?not turn on
message:
Green light is off when plugin 60w adapter 
Green light is on when plugin 85w adapter  
Both times no fan spinning.

title: 820-3115 Green light but ?not turn on
message: Did you try to start in SMC bypass mode?

title: 820-3115 Green light but ?not turn on
message:
Not start in SMC bypass mode , 
central pin of DCIN board v goes down rapidly 0 v and up 2 v , cycle.

title: 820-3115 Green light but ?not turn on
message:
If central pin voltage is not stable, there is no good conection to U6900, pin 5.
Pins 4 & 5 of U6900 aren't stable too?

title: 820-3115 Green light but ?not turn on
message:
Pins 1 U6900 =3.48 TO 3.0V isn't  stable
Pins 4 & 5 of U6900 =3.47v to 2.9v  aren't stable too
I think some component got loose connection bcs it was working unit after i changed hinges cover then this problem arise.

title: 820-3115 Green light but ?not turn on
message:
Post U6901 voltages,
Check solders and traces for U6900/01.

title: 820-3115 Green light but ?not turn on
message:
U6901 voltages:
pin 1/2=2.87v
pin4=3.49v
pin5=3.49v
solders and traces for U6900/01 are ok.
When i plug in it become orange and after few minutes no light.

title: 820-3115 Green light but ?not turn on
message:
"Pins 1 U6900 =3.48 TO 3.0V isn't stable
----------------------------
(U6901) pin4=3.49v"
That is a common trace...

title: 820-3115 Green light but ?not turn on
message: Pins 1 U6900 =3.48  is now  stable , after changing my dc jack.
